title: Relates to extensions of state and local deadlines following a state disaster emergency
summary: Relates to extensions of state and local deadlines following a state disaster emergency; adds school district to the list of municipality and district corporations; further relates to the prerequisites, time and scope thereof.
actClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 15 of the laws of 1998 relating to authorizing the extension of state and local deadlines following a state disaster emergency, in relation to the prerequisites, time and scope thereof
